`,(0,s.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,s.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-js:.eslintrc.js",children:`module.exports = {\r

    settings: {\r
        'import/resolver': {\r
            alias: {\r
                map: [\r
                    ['~', './src'],\r
                ],\r
                extensions: ['.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx', '.svelte'],\r
            },\r
        },\r
    },\r
    rules: {\r
        // https://github.com/import-js/eslint-plugin-import/blob/main/docs/rules/order.md\r
        'import/order': [\r
            'error',\r
            {\r
                groups: ['builtin', 'external', 'internal', ['parent', 'sibling', 'index']],\r
                alphabetize: {\r
                    order: 'asc',\r
                    caseInsensitive: true,\r
                },\r
                'newlines-between': 'always',\r
            },\r
        ],\r
        'import/first': 'error',\r
        'import/newline-after-import': 'error',\r
        'import/prefer-default-export': 'off',\r
        'import/no-useless-path-segments': ['error', { noUselessIndex: true }],\r
    }\r
}
